name: Undead Assembly
description: This is a project made for a small game jam by Conor Luis and I called "Undead Assembly". The concept of the game is simply to gather collectables and reassemble corpse parts. This is a concept we plan on making into a full game eventually, but we have a lot of stuff to learn still. Oh and by the way the head has an ability tied to the shift key but I didnt make it obvious in the game so sorry if you get stuck because of that.
